title: 'romantic' (but not script) font needed
content:
I need a font for a campaign that conveys "romance," however, I do not want a script font.

This is for the headline (eg, display purposes)-- the photography is romantic, but modern (clean, warm lighting)

I was thinking something along the lines of an elegant, clean, lightly-seriffed font.

any suggestions? thank you!
author: lizzyryan

comments.content:
I 'said' it before and I will state it any time again. ;) Nothing says 'romantic' than many of the faces designed and released by [Gert Wischer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020092415/http:/www.wiescher-design.de/). _(And you may also like some of the [Canada Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020092415/http:/www.canadatype.com/) types. )_

Dav(id)
Probably terribly old-fashioned of me, but I'd try Perpetua. I believe there is a font taken from a display-sized master (other than the titling, which is upper-case only).

I used Perpetua for a book on wedding photography once, I second that suggestion. It has a lovely italic.

Fournier is really nice too.

What about something calligraphic? [Brioso Pro (Opticals)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020092415/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFontPackage&code=1504) is very lovely and if you need it for large poster sizes don't overlook the oft forgotten [Brioso Pro Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020092415/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFontPackage&code=1505).
